meanings.definition: To attach a new label to something.
meanings.sent1: She relabels her notebooks with colorful stickers.
meanings.sent2: The librarian relabels the books with updated categories.
meanings.sent3: The teacher relabels the students' desks with their names in big letters.
meanings.sent4: The artist relabels the colors in his palette to match his new theme.
meanings.sent5: The gardener relabels the plants in the garden for easier identification.

meanings.definition: To change the label on something.
meanings.sent1: He carefully relabels the jars in the pantry to avoid confusion.
meanings.sent2: The museum curator relabels the artifacts for the upcoming exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The prankster relabels the office supplies with funny fake names.
meanings.sent4: The hacker relabels the files to trick the system into opening them.
meanings.sent5: The chef relabels the spice containers to keep track of freshness.

meanings.definition: To assign a new label to something.
meanings.sent1: The scientist relabels the samples with the correct identification codes.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer relabels the clothing items with the latest trends.
meanings.sent3: The child relabels the toys in the playroom with imaginative names.
meanings.sent4: The detective relabels the evidence to organize the case better.
meanings.sent5: The organizer relabels the boxes for easier storage.
